name: City of Murals
description:
City of Murals is a cute and gross, action-platformer, rogue-lite.

Premise:

The world is competing to see who can live the longest. Discoveries of alien technology have increased lifespans into the hundreds of years. While the benefits are highly sought after, the acquisition of the technology itself has proven difficult. Despite the danger and commitment required, eternal life hunters, or Eternalists, travel to the edges of the known universe searching for purple, alien, time tech that has the ability to extend life ... and power.

Features:

  • Explore and survive a cute and creepy world with non-violent and violent guns
  • Find special traversal abilities like dash , jetpack , glider and grappling hook
  • Befriend and battle weird and interesting creatures
